Week of March 23, 2015 <https://vts.inxpo.com/scripts/Server.nxp?LASCmd=L:0&AI=1&InitialDisplay=1&ClientBrowser=0&ShowKey=23126&RFR=BDL-Invite-Pivota> ANNOUNCING: FEDERATION BUSINESS DATA LAKE EMC and Pivotal are redefining big data by delivering the industry’s first purpose-built, enterprise-grade data lake, built on the Pivotal Big Data Suite. Businesses are recognizing that combining new data sources and analytic approaches generates new opportunities. But many are struggling to convert these insights into measurable business value. The Federation Business Data Lake <https://vts.inxpo.com/scripts/Server.nxp?LASCmd=L:0&AI=1&InitialDisplay=1&ClientBrowser=0&ShowKey=23126&RFR=BDL-Invite-Pivotal> clears the path for more timely and better informed business decisions. EMC, Pivotal and its Federation <http://www.emcfederation.com/> partners are delivering a solution to help customers generate new insights and scale out rapidly and securely. Learn more <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news-2/new-federation-business-data-lake-should-be-your-silver-bullet-for-big-data-success> about this solution and why it's being called a silver bullet for big data success. LEARN MORE <https://vts.inxpo.com/scripts/Server.nxp?LASCmd=L:0&AI=1&InitialDisplay=1&ClientBrowser=0&ShowKey=23126&RFR=BDL-Invite-Pivotal> EPISODE #21: WEDNESDAY, MARCH 25TH, "PAAS VS. PLATFORM" <http://pivotal.io/podcasts> Join us this week, Wednesday, March 25th for Episode #21 of our All Things Pivotal Podcast Series, "PaaS vs. Platform"
Coté talks to Andrew Clay Schafer about his preference for "Platform" over "PaaS". SUBSCRIBE <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts> FREE HOSTING WITH PIVOTAL CLOUD FOUNDRY <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/products/free-hosting-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry> Pivotal is now offering bundled managed capacity in the Pivotal Cloud Foundry software subscription, at no additional cost. Enterprises can take advantage of this new capability as a way to accelerate the adoption of Pivotal Cloud Foundry in an organization, as well as offering diverse cloud options for different workloads.
READ MORE... <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/products/free-hosting-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry> EMC TURNS OPEN SOURCE SENSEI, STAGES FIRST CLOUD FOUNDRY "DOJO" <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/features/emc-turns-open-source-sensei-stages-first-cloud-foundry-dojo> In this guest post from Brian Gallagher, President, EMC Cloud Management Division, and second degree black belt, introduces EMC's first Cloud Foundry "Dojo" in Cambridge, Massachusetts, a lab where developers can benefit from working directly with masters and advance to create new innovations through the art of code writing.
